text: WRMV-LP (94.5 FM) is a Positive Country formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Madison Heights, Virginia and serving Lynchburg, Virginia. WRMV-LP is owned and operated by Fellowship Community Church and Christian Schools. ==References== ==External links== * Cross Country 94.5 FM Online * RMV-LP RMV- LP Category:Radio stations established in 2003 RMV-LP Category:Country radio stations in the United States
title: WRMV-LP
